titleStmt.title: A true declaration of the state of the manufacture of gold and siluer threed, from the beginning of the making thereof here in England, vntill this present

notesStmt.note: Appeal by the Company of Gold-Wire-Drawers to the Privy Council for enforcement of the ordinances of their charter and for punishement of offenders--STC.
Regarding the charter of the Gold-Wire-Drawers see STC 8711, Proclamations. 1623-06-16.
The British Library copy has notes in manuscript, including a list of names and a note reading in part "imprinted an. 1624".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
